debian-ruby mailing list

Ruby packages maintenance

Discussion of issues related to Ruby on Debian systems with a stress on packaging standards. Therefore relevant for maintainers of Ruby related packages.

This list is not moderated; posting is allowed by anyone.

Posting address: debian-ruby@lists.debian.org

Subscribe / Unsubscribe

You may submit bugs against the list archives using the lists.debian.org pseudo-package or contact the maintainer at listarchives@debian.org.

See the Debian contact page for further information on contacting us.
